text_tokenized: The longer he stays , the worse it will be for him at last .

text: Pray advise him for his own sake , and for everybody ’s sake , to leave Bath directly .
text_tokenized: Pray advise him for his own sake , and for everybody ’s sake , to leave Bath directly .

text: Absence will in time make him comfortable again ; but he can have no hope here , and it is only staying to be miserable . ”
text_tokenized: Absence will in time make him comfortable again ; but he can have no hope here , and it is only staying to be miserable . ”

text: Henry smiled and said , “ I am sure my brother would not wish to do that . ”
text_tokenized: Henry smiled and said , “ I am sure my brother would not wish to do that . ”

text: “ Then you will persuade him to go away ? ”
text_tokenized: “ Then you will persuade him to go away ? ”

text: “ Persuasion is not at command ; but pardon me , if I can not even endeavour to persuade him .
text_tokenized: “ Persuasion is not at command ; but pardon me , if I can not even endeavour to persuade him .

text: I have myself told him that Miss Thorpe is engaged .
text_tokenized: I have myself told him that Miss Thorpe is engaged .

text: He knows what he is about , and must be his own master . ”
text_tokenized: He knows what he is about , and must be his own master . ”

text: “ No , he does not know what he is about , ” cried Catherine ; “ he does not know the pain he is giving my brother .
text_tokenized: “ No , he does not know what he is about , ” cried Catherine ; “ he does not know the pain he is giving my brother .

text: Not that James has ever told me so , but I am sure he is very uncomfortable .
text_tokenized: Not that James has ever told me so , but I am sure he is very uncomfortable .

text: “ And are you sure it is my brother ’s doing ? ” “ Yes , very sure . ”
text_tokenized: “ And are you sure it is my brother ’s doing ? ” “ Yes , very sure . ”

text: “ Is it my brother ’s attentions to Miss Thorpe , or Miss Thorpe ’s admission of them , that gives the pain ? ”
text_tokenized: “ Is it my brother ’s attentions to Miss Thorpe , or Miss Thorpe ’s admission of them , that gives the pain ? ”

text: “ Is not it the same thing ? ”
text_tokenized: “ Is not it the same thing ? ”

text: “ I think Mr. Morland would acknowledge a difference .
text_tokenized: “ I think Mr. Morland would acknowledge a difference .

text: No man is offended by another man ’s admiration of the woman he loves ; it is the woman only who can make it a torment . ”
text_tokenized: No man is offended by another man ’s admiration of the woman he loves ; it is the woman only who can make it a torment . ”

text: Catherine blushed for her friend , and said , “ Isabella is wrong .
text_tokenized: Catherine blushed for her friend , and said , “ Isabella is wrong .

text: But I
text_tokenized: But I

text: am sure she can not mean to torment , for she is very much attached to my brother .
text_tokenized: am sure she can not mean to torment , for she is very much attached to my brother .

text: She has been in love with him ever since they first met , and while my father ’s consent was uncertain , she fretted herself almost into a fever .
text_tokenized: She has been in love with him ever since they first met , and while my father ’s consent was uncertain , she fretted herself almost into a fever .

text: You know she must be attached to him .
text_tokenized: You know she must be attached to him .

text: ” “ I understand : she is in love with James , and flirts with Frederick . ” “ Oh no , not flirts .
text_tokenized: ” “ I understand : she is in love with James , and flirts with Frederick . ” “ Oh no , not flirts .

text: A woman in love with one man can not flirt with another . ”
text_tokenized: A woman in love with one man can not flirt with another . ”

text: “ It is probable that she will neither love so well , nor flirt so well , as she might do either singly .
text_tokenized: “ It is probable that she will neither love so well , nor flirt so well , as she might do either singly .

text: The gentlemen must each give up a little . ”
text_tokenized: The gentlemen must each give up a little . ”

text: After a short pause , Catherine resumed with , “ Then you do not believe Isabella so very much attached to my brother ? ” “ I can have no opinion on that subject . ”
text_tokenized: After a short pause , Catherine resumed with , “ Then you do not believe Isabella so very much attached to my brother ? ” “ I can have no opinion on that subject . ”

text: “ But what can your brother mean ?
text_tokenized: “ But what can your brother mean ?

text: If he knows her engagement , what can he mean by his behaviour ? ”
text_tokenized: If he knows her engagement , what can he mean by his behaviour ? ”

text: “ You are a very close questioner . ”
text_tokenized: “ You are a very close questioner . ”

text: “ Am I ?
text_tokenized: “ Am I ?

text: I only ask what I want to be told . ”
text_tokenized: I only ask what I want to be told . ”

text: “ But do you only ask what I can be expected to tell ? ”
text_tokenized: “ But do you only ask what I can be expected to tell ? ”

text: “ Yes , I think so ; for you must know your brother ’s heart . ” “ My brother ’s heart , as you term it , on the present occasion , I assure you I can only guess at . ”
text_tokenized: “ Yes , I think so ; for you must know your brother ’s heart . ” “ My brother ’s heart , as you term it , on the present occasion , I assure you I can only guess at . ”

text: “ Well ? ” “ Well !
text_tokenized: “ Well ? ” “ Well !

text: nay , if it is to be guesswork , let us all guess for ourselves .
text_tokenized: nay , if it is to be guesswork , let us all guess for ourselves .

text: To be guided by second - hand conjecture is pitiful .
text_tokenized: To be guided by second - hand conjecture is pitiful .

text: The premises are before you .
text_tokenized: The premises are before you .

text: My brother is a lively and perhaps sometimes a thoughtless young man ; he has had about a week ’s acquaintance with your friend , and he has known her engagement almost as long as he has known her . ” “ Well , ” said Catherine , after some moments ’ consideration , “ _ you _ may be able to guess at your brother ’s intentions from all this ; but I am sure I can not .
text_tokenized: My brother is a lively and perhaps sometimes a thoughtless young man ; he has had about a week ’s acquaintance with your friend , and he has known her engagement almost as long as he has known her . ” “ Well , ” said Catherine , after some moments ’ consideration , “ _ you _ may be able to guess at your brother ’s intentions from all this ; but I am sure I can not .

text: But is not your father uncomfortable about it ?
text_tokenized: But is not your father uncomfortable about it ?

text: Does not he want Captain Tilney to go away ?
text_tokenized: Does not he want Captain Tilney to go away ?

text: Sure , if your father were to speak to him , he would go .
text_tokenized: Sure , if your father were to speak to him , he would go .

text: “ My dear Miss Morland , ” said Henry , “ in this amiable solicitude for your brother ’s comfort , may you not be a little mistaken ?
text_tokenized: “ My dear Miss Morland , ” said Henry , “ in this amiable solicitude for your brother ’s comfort , may you not be a little mistaken ?

text: Are you not carried a little too far ?
text_tokenized: Are you not carried a little too far ?

text: Would he thank you , either on his own account or Miss Thorpe ’s , for supposing that her affection , or at least her good behaviour , is only to be secured by her seeing nothing of Captain Tilney ?
text_tokenized: Would he thank you , either on his own account or Miss Thorpe ’s , for supposing that her affection , or at least her good behaviour , is only to be secured by her seeing nothing of Captain Tilney ?

text: Is he safe only in solitude ?
text_tokenized: Is he safe only in solitude ?

text: Or is her heart constant to him only when unsolicited by anyone else ?
text_tokenized: Or is her heart constant to him only when unsolicited by anyone else ?

text: He can not think this — and you may be sure that he would not have you think it .
text_tokenized: He can not think this — and you may be sure that he would not have you think it .

text: I will not say , ‘ Do not be uneasy , ’ because I know that you are so , at this moment ; but be as little uneasy as you can .
text_tokenized: I will not say , ‘ Do not be uneasy , ’ because I know that you are so , at this moment ; but be as little uneasy as you can .

text: You have no doubt of the mutual attachment of your brother and your friend
text_tokenized: You have no doubt of the mutual attachment of your brother and your friend

text: ; depend upon it , therefore , that real jealousy never can exist between them ; depend upon it that no disagreement between them can be of any duration .
text_tokenized: ; depend upon it , therefore , that real jealousy never can exist between them ; depend upon it that no disagreement between them can be of any duration .

text: Their hearts are open to each other , as neither heart can be to you ; they know exactly what is required and what can be borne ; and you may be certain that one will never tease the other beyond what is known to be pleasant . ” Perceiving her still to look doubtful and grave , he added , “ Though Frederick does not leave Bath with us , he will probably remain but a very short time , perhaps only a few days behind us .
text_tokenized: Their hearts are open to each other , as neither heart can be to you ; they know exactly what is required and what can be borne ; and you may be certain that one will never tease the other beyond what is known to be pleasant . ” Perceiving her still to look doubtful and grave , he added , “ Though Frederick does not leave Bath with us , he will probably remain but a very short time , perhaps only a few days behind us .

text: His leave of absence will soon expire , and he must return to his regiment .
text_tokenized: His leave of absence will soon expire , and he must return to his regiment .

text: And what will then be their acquaintance ?
text_tokenized: And what will then be their acquaintance ?

text: The mess - room will drink Isabella Thorpe for a fortnight , and she will laugh with your brother over poor Tilney ’s passion for a month . ”
text_tokenized: The mess - room will drink Isabella Thorpe for a fortnight , and she will laugh with your brother over poor Tilney ’s passion for a month . ”

text: Catherine would contend no longer against comfort .
text_tokenized: Catherine would contend no longer against comfort .

text: She had resisted its approaches during the whole length of a speech , but it now carried her captive .
text_tokenized: She had resisted its approaches during the whole length of a speech , but it now carried her captive .

text: Henry Tilney must know best .
text_tokenized: Henry Tilney must know best .

text: She blamed herself for the extent of her fears , and resolved never to think so seriously on the subject again .
text_tokenized: She blamed herself for the extent of her fears , and resolved never to think so seriously on the subject again .

text: Her resolution was supported by Isabella ’s behaviour in their parting interview .
text_tokenized: Her resolution was supported by Isabella ’s behaviour in their parting interview .

text: The Thorpes spent the last evening of Catherine ’s stay in Pulteney Street , and nothing passed between the lovers to excite her uneasiness , or make her quit them in apprehension .
text_tokenized: The Thorpes spent the last evening of Catherine ’s stay in Pulteney Street , and nothing passed between the lovers to excite her uneasiness , or make her quit them in apprehension .

text: James was in excellent spirits , and Isabella most engagingly placid .
text_tokenized: James was in excellent spirits , and Isabella most engagingly placid .

text: Her tenderness for her friend seemed rather the first feeling of her heart ; but that at such a moment was allowable ; and once she gave her lover a flat contradiction , and once she drew back her hand ; but Catherine remembered Henry ’s instructions , and placed it all to judicious affection .
